en: Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部直属的全国重点大学，是“世界一流大学和一流学科建设”（双一流A类）、原“985工程”、原“211工程”重点建设高校，以航空航天特色和工程技术优势著称。
description.en: A national key university directly under the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China, designated as a Double First-Class University (Class A), and part of the former Project 985 and Project 211. It is known for its features in aeronautics and astronautics and its strengths in engineering and technology.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部
en: Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管工业、通信业、软件服务业和信息化等事务的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for industry, communications, software services, and informatization.

nodes.id: 中国高等院校院系调整

zh-cn: 中国高等院校院系调整

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。他指示并支持了北京航空学院的筹建工作。
description.en: Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China. He directed and supported the establishment of the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理，他于1951年提出创办一所航空大学。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Premier of the People's Republic of China, who proposed the establishment of an aeronautical university in 1951.

nodes.id: 北京航空学院红旗战斗队

zh-cn: 北京航空学院红旗战斗队

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间北京航空学院的一个红卫兵组织。
description.en: A Red Guard organization at the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国社会活动家、宗教领袖、诗人和书法家，为北京航空航天大学题写校名。
description.en: Chinese social activist, religious leader, poet, and calligrapher who inscribed the name for Beihang University.

en: Looking up to the Starry Sky

description.zh-cn: 由温家宝创作的诗作，后被定为北京航空航天大学校歌。
description.en: A poem written by Wen Jiabao, which was later adopted as the anthem of Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理，其诗作《仰望星空》被定为北京航空航天大学校歌。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the People's Republic of China. His poem 'Looking up to the Starry Sky' was adopted as the anthem of Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 原北京航空航天大学教授，因性骚扰博士生事件被校方撤销职务并取消教师资格。
description.en: Former professor at Beihang University, who was dismissed and had his teaching qualifications revoked due to a sexual harassment incident involving doctoral students.

description.zh-cn: 原北京航空航天大学博士生，实名举报其副导师陈小武性骚扰。
description.en: Former doctoral student at Beihang University who publicly accused her deputy supervisor Chen Xiaowu of sexual harassment.

nodes.id: 陈小武性骚扰博士生事件

zh-cn: 陈小武性骚扰博士生事件

description.zh-cn: 中国计算机科学家，中国科学院院士，曾任北京航空航天大学校长（2002-2009）。
description.en: Chinese computer scientist, academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and former president of Beihang University (2002-2009).

description.zh-cn: 北京航空航天大学的学生社团，曾领导组织针对食堂广告的抗议活动。
description.en: A student society at Beihang University that once led protests against a canteen advertisement.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国审计署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国审计署
en: National Audit Office of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 北京航空航天大学教授，因套取科研经费被审计署通报并受学校处分。
description.en: Professor at Beihang University who was reported by the National Audit Office and disciplined by the university for misappropriating research funds.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国工业和信息化部

description.zh-cn: 北京航空航天大学隶属于中华人民共和国工业和信息化部。
description.en: Beihang University is subordinate to the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中国高等院校院系调整

description.zh-cn: 北京航空航天大学（原北京航空学院）是在1952年全国高等院校院系调整的背景下，由多所大学的航空院系合并组建而成。
description.en: Beihang University (formerly Beijing Institute of Aeronautics) was established against the backdrop of the 1952 reorganization of Chinese higher education, by merging the aeronautical departments of several universities.

description.zh-cn: 北京航空学院以清华大学航空工程学院为主体，并入了其他院校相关专业而成。
description.en: The Beijing Institute of Aeronautics was formed with the Tsinghua University School of Aeronautical Engineering as its main body, incorporating related departments from other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 北京航空学院组建时并入了四川大学的相关专业。
description.en: Related departments from Sichuan University were merged into the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics upon its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 北京航空学院组建时并入了北京工业学院的相关专业，并在其旧礼堂举行了成立大会。
description.en: Related departments from the Beijing Institute of Technology were merged into the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics upon its establishment, and its founding ceremony was held in the former's auditorium.

description.zh-cn: 1951年，时任总理周恩来同意并指示筹办一所专门的航空大学。1952年，根据其指示筹建了北京航空学院。
description.en: In 1951, then-Premier Zhou Enlai agreed to and directed the establishment of a specialized aeronautical university. Following his directive, the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics was founded in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 时任副总理李富春在讨论航空工业建设的会议上提出“急需办一所航空大学”的建议，得到周恩来同意。
description.en: Then-Vice Premier Li Fuchun proposed the 'urgent need to establish an aeronautical university' during a meeting on the development of the aviation industry, which was approved by Zhou Enlai.

relationships.source: 北京航空学院红旗战斗队

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，北京航空航天大学（时称北京航空学院）一度被红卫兵组织北航“红旗”控制。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Beihang University (then Beijing Institute of Aeronautics) was once controlled by the Red Guard organization 'Beihang Red Flag'.

relationships.target: 北京航空学院红旗战斗队

description.zh-cn: 北京航空学院红旗战斗队是文化大革命期间的一个红卫兵组织。
description.en: The Beihang 'Red Flag' Combat Team was a Red Guard organization during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1988年4月，经国家教委批准，北京航空学院改名为北京航空航天大学。
description.en: In April 1988, with the approval of the State Education Commission, the Beijing Institute of Aeronautics was renamed Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，赵朴初为北京航空航天大学题写了校名。
description.en: In 1988, Zhao Puchu inscribed the university name for Beihang University.

description.zh-cn: 2010年5月13日，北京航空航天大学宣布采用温家宝的诗作《仰望星空》作为校歌。
description.en: On May 13, 2010, Beihang University announced the adoption of Wen Jiabao's poem 'Looking up to the Starry Sky' as its school anthem.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝创作了诗作《仰望星空》。
description.en: Wen Jiabao authored the poem 'Looking up to the Starry Sky'.

relationships.target: 陈小武性骚扰博士生事件

description.zh-cn: 罗茜茜在微博上发表文章，实名指控其副导师陈小武性骚扰，引发了该事件。
description.en: Luo Xixi published an article on Weibo, publicly accusing her deputy supervisor Chen Xiaowu of sexual harassment, which triggered the incident.

description.zh-cn: 陈小武被指控对罗茜茜及其他女学生实行性骚扰。
description.en: Chen Xiaowu was accused of sexually harassing Luo Xixi and other female students.

description.zh-cn: 经调查核实陈小武存在对学生的性骚扰行为，北京航空航天大学决定撤销其全部职务，并取消其教师资格。
description.en: After investigation confirmed that Chen Xiaowu had sexually harassed students, Beihang University decided to revoke all his positions and cancel his teaching qualifications.

description.zh-cn: 李未在任校长期间，因推动改校名和卷入广西招生丑闻等事件引发争议，对学校声誉造成负面影响。
description.en: During his tenure as president, Li Wei caused controversy over his push to change the university's name and his involvement in the Guangxi admissions scandal, which negatively impacted the university's reputation.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，北航马克思主义学会在“学五食堂广告事件”中组织了一系列抗议活动，对校方管理提出挑战。
description.en: In 2003, the Beihang Marxism Society organized a series of protests during the 'Xue Wu Canteen Advertisement Incident', challenging the university's administration.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国审计署

description.zh-cn: 2012年，审计署通报称北京航空航天大学教授刘沛清套取科研项目经费。
description.en: In 2012, the National Audit Office reported that Beihang University professor Liu Peiqing had misappropriated research project funds.

description.zh-cn: 2012年7月，北京航空航天大学因刘沛清套取科研经费问题给予其党内严重警告、行政记大过处分。
description.en: In July 2012, Beihang University gave Liu Peiqing a severe party warning and a major administrative demerit for misappropriating research funds.
